p: Various dose of EOs (up to 3000 μg/mL) containing 0.001 % of Tween 80 were added to 10 μL of fungal spores (1 × 10 6 per mL) in 96-well plate (Corning Inc. Technology Company, USA) and total volume was adjusted to 100 μL with Sabouraud dextrose broth (HiMedia, Mumbai, India). Following, plates were allowed for incubation at 28 °C, and concentration at which fungal growth was not observed after 3 days of incubation was determined as MIC.
